title: Chicken and sweet potato hash
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) potatoes, peeled', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) orange-fleshed sweet potatoes, peeled', '225 g (8 oz) leeks, sliced', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '225 g (8 oz) cooked chicken meat, without skin, diced', '170 g (6 oz) frozen sweetcorn, thawed with boiling water and drained', '8 sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and chopped', '1 tsp paprika', 'salt', 'Yogurt-garlic sauce', '150 g (5½ oz) plain low-fat yogurt', '1 small garlic clove, crushed', '½ tsp paprika']
